text:
♪ I ALWAYS LOVE
THIS TIME OF YEAR ♪

♪ THAT SPECIAL SOMETHING
IN THE AIR ♪

♪ THERE'S SOMETHING ABOUT
THOSE DECEMBER NIGHTS ♪

♪ LET'S CELEBRATE
WITH THAT CHRISTMAS SOUL ♪

♪ LET'S DECK THE HALLS
WITH THAT CHRISTMAS SOUL ♪

♪ WE'VE GOT THAT REINDEER
KIND OF CHEER ♪

♪ ALL THE WAY
FROM THE NORTH POLE ♪

♪ JUST FEEL THAT,
JUST FEEL THAT ♪

♪ JUST FEEL THAT,
JUST FEEL THAT ♪

♪ JUST FEEL THAT,
JUST FEEL THAT ♪
AND HAVE A HAPPY NEW YEAR!

MAN, I LOVE
CHRISTMAS IN MIAMI.

I JUST WISH SANTA
DIDN'T WEAR SHORTS.

I CAN'T BELIEVE THIS
YEAR'S ALMOST OVER.

WELL, YOU KNOW
WHAT THEY SAY.

IT IS FUN.  YOU CAN DIP
ANYTHING IN CHEESE.

JIMMY STARR SIGNED ME
TO STARR RECORDS

AND I RELEASED 
MY FIRST ALBUM.

AND YOU STILL MIGHT
GET TO LIVE OUT
YOUR BIGGEST DREAM.

PLAYING TIMES SQUARE
FOR NEW YEAR'S EVE!

IF TRISH CAN
PULL THAT OFF,

THAT'D BE THE BEST
CHRISTMAS PRESENT EVER.

YOU KNOW WHAT MY BEST 
CHRISTMAS PRESENT WAS?

WAIT.  DID YOU JUST
SAY THE FONDUE?

I BOOKED AUSTIN TO PLAY
TIMES SQUARE ON NEW YEAR'S EVE!

MAN, TIMES SQUARE 
ON NEW YEAR'S EVE.

A BILLION PEOPLE
ARE GONNA BE WATCHING.

NOW IS PROBABLY A GOOD TIME
TO FINISH THAT SONG.

THANKS FOR MAKING
THIS HAPPEN, TRISH.

I BETTER CALL
TO SEE WHAT TIME

- NO.  NOT TIM'S SQUARE PIZZA.
- ( phone ringing )

TIM'S SQUARE,
WHAT CAN I GET YOU?

WE SPOKE EARLIER
WHEN YOU BOOKED AUSTIN

TO PLAY HERE
ON NEW YEAR'S EVE.

I DIDN'T BOOK AUSTIN
AT TIMES SQUARE.

I BOOKED HIM
AT TIM'S SQUARE PIZZA.

BUT SINCE YOU HAVE
TIM ON THE PHONE,

COULD YOU ORDER ME
A HALF MUSHROOM, 
HALF SURPRISE ME?

♪ YOU'RE MY POINT,
YOU'RE MY GUARD ♪

♪ AND I SEE OUR NAMES TOGETHER
ON EVERY BILLBOARD ♪

♪ WE'RE HEADED FOR THE TOP,
WE'VE GOT IT ON LOCK ♪

♪ OH, THERE'S NO WAY I COULD
MAKE IT WITHOUT YA ♪

♪ DO IT WITHOUT YA,
BE HERE WITHOUT YA ♪

♪ IT'S NO FUN
WHEN YOU'RE DOING IT SOLO ♪

♪ WITH YOU IT'S LIKE, "WHOA,"
YEAH, AND I KNOW ♪

♪ THERE'S NO WAY I COULD
MAKE IT WITHOUT YA ♪

♪ DO IT WITHOUT YA,
BE HERE WITHOUT YA. ♪

SO, I WAS THINKING
THE SONG SHOULD BE

SINCE YOUR DREAM'S 
ABOUT TO COME TRUE.

OH.  THIS ALL
SEEMS SO UNREAL--

ANYWAY, I'VE BEEN
WORKING ON A MELODY.

I NEED TO TALK
TO YOU IN PRIVATE.

IT'S OKAY.
HE CAN'T HEAR ANYTHING.

THERE'S BEEN
A TEENY, TINY MIX-UP.

AUSTIN'S NOT PLAYING
IN TIMES SQUARE ON
NEW YEAR'S EVE.

I MEAN,
I'D DO IT MYSELF,

BUT INSTEAD OF
CHASING YOUR DREAMS,

LET'S MAKE IT ABOUT
YOUR DREAMS FINALLY
COMING TRUE.

THAT WOULD BE
A TERRIBLE IDEA.

A LOT OF PEOPLE'S
DREAMS DON'T COME TRUE.

WE SHOULDN'T RUB IT
IN THEIR FACES.

WOW.
WAY TO BUM ME OUT.

SITTING ON A BEACH
IN HAWAII,

OR SITTING ON A PLANE
FOR 12 HOURS TO GET THERE?

CLEARLY, YOU KNOW
NOTHING ABOUT DREAMS

OR THE FUN
OF AIR TRAVEL.

I DON'T WANT TO WRITE
ABOUT THE JOURNEY.

I WANT TO WRITE ABOUT
HOW GREAT IT FEELS

CAN YOU IMAGINE
WHAT IT'S GONNA FEEL LIKE

WHEN WE FINALLY
GET TO TIMES SQUARE?

SO HOW DID AUSTIN
TAKE THE NEWS?

TRISH, I'M TIRED
OF YOU MAKING MESSES

AND EXPECTING SOMEBODY ELSE
TO CLEAN THEM UP.

DEZ, YOU DON'T
HAVE TO DO THAT.

AND I DON'T HAVE TO
SWEEP UP THE MALL
PARKING LOT EITHER.

BUT I DO IT
BECAUSE I CARE.

YOU HAVE TO TELL HIM
HE'S NOT PERFORMING 
IN TIMES SQUARE.

I CAN'T BREAK
HIS HEART AGAIN.

I'LL NEVER FORGET
HOW UPSET HE WAS

WHEN I TOLD HIM
ZEBRAS WEREN'T REAL.

OKAY.  NOBODY'S GONNA
HAVE TO TELL HIM ANYTHING

YOU DISTRACT JIMMY
WHILE I TAKE HIS COMPUTER

AND VIDEO CHAT
THE TIMES SQUARE
PROMOTER.

- CHECK.
- HE AND JIMMY
  ARE OLD FRIENDS.

HE'LL ANSWER IF
HE THINKS I'M JIMMY.

AND IF YOUR PLAN
DOESN'T WORK,

AUSTIN STILL
HAS THAT GREAT GIG 
AT THE PIZZA PLACE.

WHAT'S SO URGENT 
YOU HAD TO SEE ME
AT 9:00 IN THE MORNING

I HAVE A BUSINESS PROPOSAL
THAT I THINK YOU'RE GONNA 
WANT TO HEAR.

MY JET'S WAITING
TO TAKE ME TO NEW YORK.

You're the girl who's
left me 58 messages.

I KNOW YOU HAVE OTHER ACTS
BOOKED FOR TONIGHT,

BUT AUSTIN ONLY NEEDS
ENOUGH TIME TO DO ONE SONG.

NEW YEAR'S EVE PERFORMANCE
YOU'VE EVER SEEN.

ARE THREE THINGS 
THAT NOBODY KNOWS
HOW THEY WORK.

I KNOW HOW ALL
THOSE THINGS WORK.

WHAT ARE YOU TRYING
TO SELL ME?

WELL, THAT'S
A VERY GOOD QUESTION.

I'M TRYING
TO SELL YOU, UH...

WELL, THIS WAS A BIG
WASTE OF MY TIME.

OKAY.  THAT'S NOT
YOUR SHOE SALE SCREAM.

AND THAT'S NOT
YOUR "I GOT ALL 'A's

'CAUSE I'VE DEFINITELY
NEVER HEARD THAT ONE BEFORE.

TO TONIGHT'S
NEW YEAR'S EVE SHOW

SUPER.  WE WILL
ENJOY WATCHING HIM

FROM THE SAFETY
OF OUR PENTHOUSE.

JESSIE, WE HAVE TO GO SEE
AUSTIN PERFORM IN PERSON!

SORRY, EMMA,
BUT I HAVE OTHER PLANS.

WORKING ON YOUR SAME OLD
NEW YEAR'S RESOLUTIONS

UH, HE DOESN'T
HAVE TO BE A PRINCE.

I BOOKED AUSTIN AT THE REAL
TIMES SQUARE TONIGHT.

- YES!
- AND I WAS THIS CLOSE

TRISH, I KNEW
YOU COULD DO IT.

NOW ALL I HAVE TO DO
IS JUST CHECK ON OUR
FLIGHT.

CHEERI, IS OUR 1:00
FLIGHT ON TIME?

Cheeri: Your 1:00 flight
left at 1:00 this morning.

I WANTED OUR FLIGHT
FOR THIS AFTERNOON.

WHY ARE YOU ALL
LOOKING AT ME LIKE THAT?

ALLY HAS SOMETHING
SHE WANTS TO TELL YOU.

I'D DO IT MYSELF,
BUT I'M NOT HERE.

AUSTIN, THERE'S NO
EASY WAY TO SAY THIS.

YOU'RE NOT PERFORMING
AT TIMES SQUARE.

HEY, THAT WAS ACTUALLY
KIND OF EASY TO SAY.

I CAN'T BELIEVE TRISH
MESSED UP OUR FLIGHT.

I WAS SO CLOSE
TO MY DREAM.

A GUY WHOSE DREAMS
NEVER COME TRUE.

NO, YOU'LL NEVER
GET OVER THIS ONE.

I SHOULD BE GRATEFUL
FOR THE YEAR I'VE HAD.

I WANT TO GO
TO NEW YORK.

I JUST GOT OFF THE PHONE
WITH MY AUNT

AND YOU GUYS ARE ON
THE NEXT FLIGHT TO 
NEW YORK.

OH, I'LL BE ON 
THE FLIGHT TOO.

I'M YOUR FLIGHT ATTENDANT
IN TRAINING, TRISH.

THE CAPTAIN HAS TURNED OFF
THE FASTEN SEAT BELT SIGN

AND YOU CAN NOW USE
ELECTRONIC DEVICES.

ALTHOUGH I DON'T
RECOMMEND USING CHEERI.

IT'S THERE A PILLOW
UP THERE?

I'M NOT GONNA 
DANCE FOR YOU.

YOU'RE SCARED TO DANCE
'CAUSE YOU'RE NOT AUSTIN MOON.

PLEASE.  I'M NOT
SCARED OF ANYTHING.

I KNEW YOU WEREN'T
AUSTIN MOON.

I LEFT MY EARBUDS
IN MY BAG.

YOU GO GO RIGHT
AHEAD, DEAR.

ON SECOND THOUGHT,
I DON'T WANT TO 
LISTEN TO MUSIC.

YOU'VE GOT TO 
BE KIDDING ME.

THERE, NOW DO YOU
BELIEVE I'M AUSTIN MOON?

YOU MIND IF I
SCOOT PAST AGAIN?

YOU'RE GONNA HOLD IT
AND LIKE IT!

WOULD YOU MIND IF I 
SIT THERE FOR A SEC?

I NEED TO TALK
TO AUSTIN.

HE'S NOT THE REAL
AUSTIN MOON.

SO?  ARE YOU NERVOUS
ABOUT TONIGHT?

I CAN'T BELIEVE 
A BILLION PEOPLE

WELL, NOW I'M
A LITTLE NERVOUS.

I'VE BEEN WATCHING
NEW YEAR'S EVE IN 
TIMES SQUARE

I REMEMBER THOSE
PERFORMERS MADE ME FEEL
LIKE I COULD DO ANYTHING.

I WANT TO MAKE PEOPLE
FEEL THE SAME WAY.

THE CAPTAIN HAS INFORMED ME
WE'RE EXPERIENCING

SO INSTEAD OF LANDING
IN NEW YORK,

AND I'M GONNA MISS
MY CONNECTING FLIGHT

I'M SUPPOSED TO BE
ON STAGE IN THREE HOURS.

IT'S NOT SO BAD.
ACCORDING TO THIS MAP,

PHILADELPHIA IS ONLY
THIS FAR AWAY FROM NEW YORK.

I'M SURE WE CAN TRAVEL
THIS FAR IN THREE HOURS.

WE'VE COME TOO FAR
TO GIVE UP NOW.

YOU CAN DO ANYTHING.
YOU'RE AUSTIN MOON!

- NO, HE'S NOT.
- ZIP IT, KID.

AUSTIN,
I'M GONNA FIND A WAY

TO GET YOU
TO TIMES SQUARE.

I'M YOUR MANAGER.
I'LL FIGURE IT OUT.

WHEN I START A JOB,
I ALWAYS FINISH IT.

AND THE CAB RIDE IS
NOW OFFICIALLY LONGER

AND MY WATCH WAS
STOLEN AT THE AIRPORT.

( groans )
IS IT TOO LATE
TO TURN BACK?

YES.  WE'RE ALREADY
IN CENTRAL PARK.

WE'RE GONNA GET TO
THE SHOW ON TIME.

SEE, AUSTIN?
YOU WERE WORRIED
FOR NOTHING.

DO WE HAVE ENOUGH
TO COVER IT?

LET'S PUT ALL OF
OUR MONEY TOGETHER.

AUSTIN.  AUSTIN,
YOU'RE ON MY PURSE.

I DON'T WANT YOU SEEING
WHERE I KEEP MY MONEY.

YOUR SECRET HIDING PLACE
IS YOUR WALLET?

IS THIS GONNA BE ENOUGH
TO GET US TO TIMES SQUARE?

WELL, I GUESS
THAT WASN'T ENOUGH.

I FEEL BAD
WE COULDN'T TIP HIM.

HE'S GOT OUR BAGS
IN THE TRUNK.

HEY!  I SEE THE BALL.
WE MUST BE CLOSE.

CHEERI, HOW FAR AWAY
ARE WE FROM TIMES SQUARE?

COME ON, GUYS. 
LET'S JUST MAKE
A RUN FOR IT.

GO SEE AUSTIN MOON
PERFORM TONIGHT?

SORRY, EMMA.
THE ANSWER IS STILL NO.

TIMES SQUARE IS
FILLED WITH ALL
SORTS OF

CRAZY, ROWDY PEOPLE
ON NEW YEAR'S.

RYAN SEACREST IS HOSTING
THE NEW YEAR'S EVE TELECAST.

YOU MIGHT GET
A CHANCE TO MEET HIM.

UH, EXCUSE ME, OFFICER.
WE NEED TO GET THROUGH.

YEAH!  HE'S PERFORMING
IN 18 MINUTES AND 23 SECONDS.

WELL, IF HE'S PERFORMING,
I SUPPOSE I COULD JUST
LET HIM THROUGH.

NO ONE ELSE IS
GETTING THROUGH.

COME ON, THERE'S GOT
TO BE ANOTHER WAY.

- ARE YOU?
- YES, I'M AUSTIN MOON.

BUT I'M NOT GONNA SING
OR DANCE TO PROVE IT.

AS YOU CAN SEE,
SHE'S A BIG FAN.

I'M JESSIE,
AND THIS IS EMMA.

THIS IS ALLY,
TRISH, AND DEZ.

SO WHAT ARE YOU 
DOING DOWN HERE?

AREN'T YOU SUPPOSED TO 
BE PERFORMING UP THERE?

YEAH, BUT THAT COP
WON'T LET US THROUGH,

AND THERE'S NO OTHER WAY
FOR ME TO GET UP THERE.

I NEVER THOUGHT I'D BE FLYING
ABOVE NEW YORK CITY

IN A HELICOPTER
ON NEW YEAR'S EVE!

I NEVER THOUGHT I'D
THROW UP IN A HELICOPTER.

BUT ON A MAGICAL
NIGHT LIKE TONIGHT,

AND THE BEST PART IS
YOU GUYS ARE HERE WITH ME.

I'M SO GLAD YOU
FEEL THAT WAY.

BECAUSE I AM NEVER
LEAVING YOUR SIDE.

AND YOU KNOW
HOW TO FLY IT.

OH, I DON'T KNOW
HOW TO FLY IT.

IF I DIDN'T KNOW
HOW TO FLY IT.

WHERE'S AUSTIN?
HE GOES ON IN ONE MINUTE.

WE'RE JUST ABOUT
TO LAND THE HELICOPTER.

♪ I KNOW IT'S ON WHEN
I CAN'T STOP MYSELF ♪

♪ 'CAUSE YOU GOT THAT
BOOM DA BOOM BOOM ♪

♪ PUT YOUR HANDS UP 
AND GET IT ROCKIN' ♪

♪ HEY HEY
SHOW THE WHOLE WORLD ♪

♪ PUT YOUR HANDS UP
WE'RE LIGHTING UP THE SKY ♪

NOT YOU.
NO, NOT YOU EITHER.

APPARENTLY THERE'S 
A LOT OF GUYS NAMED
RYAN IN NEW YORK.

BUT THERE'S ONLY
ONE AUSTIN MOON,

AND I GOT HIS
PHONE NUMBER!

WOW.  RICH KIDS
WILL BUY ANYTHING.

WHY ARE YOU STARING
AT ME LIKE THAT?

OH, I STARTED TEARING UP
DURING YOUR PERFORMANCE,

WHATEVER YOUR NEXT
BIG DREAM IS,

JUST KNOW I'M GONNA
BE THERE FOR YOU.

HEY, HOW ARE WE
GETTING HOME?

I DON'T KNOW.
THAT'S YOUR PROBLEM.
